data-management.title: Data Management
data-management.description: Designed data pipelines and dashboards to facilitate analytics
full-description: I created Power BI dashboards and ER Studio data models to facilitate analytics. I also designed an organisation-wide Data Governance Portal in an effort to enforce good data management practices in the ministry. I further worked on managing user permissions data, implementing scripts to reduce the workflow by over 80%.

data-analytics.title: Data Analytics
data-analytics.description: Developed and operated models to optimise the placement of ambulances
full-description: I worked on and operated a data science model that optimised the placement of SCDF appliances; I proposed and implemented pipelines that reduced workflow by 67%. I further used it to produce analytics reports and predictions to assist in the decision-making process.
I further conducted operational analysis on over a dozen projects from the 6 departments (Medical, Technology, Operations, Finance, Training, Logistics).
I also supervised and trained a team of 4 juniors in the creation of Tableau dashboards and data science models.

robotics.title: Programming Head
robotics.description: Taught and facilitated programming at Victoria Junior College
full-description: As a speciality head, I organised training sessions to impart relevant coding knowledge upon other club-members, guiding them to win competitions. I also developed robotics programs using Python and C, participating in various robotics competitions. Besides that, as an executive committee member, I played a role in organising events such as camps and other club activities.
